Standard.Name: The Treasure of Hassan Ben Sahid 1.1.1.1.1.2.2

English.Text: Though pleasant, the search is fruitless. There are many gardens between the arched babs of the old town, none any less sweet-scented or busy-with-bees than the last. The crew give up their efforts to find the spot where Ben Sahid's treasure lies buried, instead preferring the less tangible rewards of exploring a new and unfamiliar place.
